content: row down work the bobbles in the wrong side of the bag repeat more 4 times increase 1 chain in each next 5 spaces * 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the same stitche 1 bobble and work more 5 times 2 single_crochet 1 bobble until the end row 14 2 single_crochet 1 bobble**yo pull the yarn repeat more 2 times work all stitches in the hook together ** insert the hook two row down work the bobbles in the wrong side of the bag repeat more 4 times increase 1 chain in each next 5 spaces * 6 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the same stitche 1 bobble and work more 5 times 2 single_crochet 1 bobble until the end bind off bottom chain 5 work 72 row in shell bind off handlles cut 12 trip of 2 m each work in macrame repeat to the other handlle finish weave the bottom to the two parts of the bag do 2 more single_crochet row in the top of the bag weave handlles iff you have any questions please e-mail me sintra 26 de outubro de 2008
